name: Project: Blue
description:
Project: Blue

An Action Runner designed for iOS and Android. Travel to different locations across a planet in turmoil and help liberate it from the greatest threat the world has ever known, multinational conglomerates.

Take control of a highly advanced android, originally developed as a weapon to be sold to the highest bidder. Instead of that fate, it has been captured and reprogrammed to fight back against its creators by disrupting its many operations across the globe.

Features
  • Multiple Levels
  • Power Ups
  • Boss Fights
  • Leaderboards
